radiographic_examinations.findings: High-grade atrioventricular block; sinus rate at approximately 85 beats/min; ventricular rate of 75 beats/min; abnormal early repolarization with 3-mm coved ST-segment elevation and a biphasic T wave in the right precordial leads V1 and V2, consistent with type 1 Brugada's pattern.
radiographic_examinations.changes_over_time: With continued antibiotic treatment, the type 1 Brugada's pattern resolved but a first-degree atrioventricular block remained.
